A temple is a space dedicated to worship and meditation. Most temples are dedicated to specific deities, though it isnâ€™t unheard of to find temples dedicated to general connections, multi- or non-denominational worship, or simple meditation.

During downtime, a mystic or other faithful can use a temple for the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.73lSOAnF2qMQLWoS.JournalEntryPage.OstVErCUe16Ja0p2]{entertain} downtime activity (Character Operations Manual 152) for other willing participants and substitute a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.HXcmgteT2OegqFrB]{Mysticism} skill check for the normal Profession skill check. A temple also grants a +1 circumstance bonus to Mysticism checks made as part of the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.73lSOAnF2qMQLWoS.JournalEntryPage.u5XjHIGgJ9VEZayK]{channel divinity} downtime activity (page 24).
